title: [Large-Scale] 3D Geometry Learning Strategies Using Visual Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary plane geometry concepts and ability to interpret 2D drawings
context.additional_context: Learners must install SketchUp Make software in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment, with competency assessed via project-based evaluations.

learning_goals: One can accurately convert three-dimensional geometric shapes into two-dimensional orthographic projections (front view, side view, plan view).
One can improve spatial perception skills by more than 20% using visual tools.
One can achieve problem-solving skills at or above van Hieleâ€™s Level 3 (abstract relational analysis) in geometric thinking.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
